lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Presidential spokesman Frota Netto told journalists earlier today the government was considering a suggestion by the Chief of Civilian Staff at the Presidency Marco Maciel that a new multi-party cabinet be formed to deal with the country's current economic difficulties.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Sayad was one of the architects of last year's "Plano Cruzado" program, which froze prices, ended widespread indexation of the economy and introduced the new cruzado currency to replace the cruzeiro in a bid to cut the 250 pct annual inflation rate.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: No official reasons for the resignation were immediately available, but sources close to the government said Sayad had pressed for a three-month price freeze and sharp government spending cuts to combat inflation.

lst.name: sentence
